scripts.build:all: npm run build -w 3d && node scripts/sync-3d-to-web-static.mjs && npm run build -w web
scripts.build:web: node scripts/sync-3d-to-web-static.mjs && npm run build -w web
scripts.start:3d: npm run build -w 3d && npm run preview -w 3d -- --port 4174 --host 127.0.0.1
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n web,3d -c blue,magenta "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:3d"
